com.beowulfe.hap.accessories

Interface Thermostat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BasicThermostat, CoolingThermostat, HeatingThermostat, HomekitAccessory, TemperatureSensor
    Deprecated. 
    Use BasicThermostat, HeatingThermostat, and CoolingThermostat instead

    @Deprecated
public interface Thermostat
extends BasicThermostat, HeatingThermostat, CoolingThermostat
    A thermostat with heating and cooling controls.
    Author:
    Andy Lintner
